t: Where are Roper Appliances made? | Little Home Appliance
s: April 30, 2020 - Roper appliances are made in the same factories as Whirlpool appliances which include Clyde, Ohio for washers, Marion, Ohio for dryers, and Findlay, Ohio for dishwashers. So most Roper products are made in the state of Ohio. We’re often asked whether Roper is a good brand.

t: Roper Technologies - Wikipedia
s: April 17, 2025 - George D. Roper became the sole owner of the Van Wie Gas Stove company after the company's debts had been paid off on September 1, 1894. 10 days later, a fire destroyed the facility.

G.E. in Deal To Acquire Roper - The New York Times
s: April 1, 1988 - Under the agreement, G.E. will acquire Roper's manufacturing capacity for stoves and lawn equipment, while Whirlpool will get the Roper name for major appliances. G.E. will supply Whirlpool with electric and gas ranges for the Roper brand for at least two years.
